hero.wuming.name: Wu Ming
hero.wuming.story:
No one knows his real name, but every town has hard of his legend-

As a warrior who wanders the land, Wu Ming has made a name for himself as a martial artist. He reached a high level of perfection in his skills, and is not adraid to use his strength to help the weak. His chivalry has earned him an excellent reputation, and with his Dragonslayer in hand, he is a terror to the opportunistic bandits who roam the Tundra.

Though he has become accustomed to the life of a wanderer, he still stays temporily in poorer towns to teach Survivor how to protec themselves. After all, like an old saying from his distant hometown, "Teach a man to fish, and you feed him for a lifetime."

Wu Ming is skilled not just in martial arts, but in music and the arts. However, what people praise more about him is his humbleness and amiable personality. He would even play the role of a schoolteacher in the town sometimes and teach children how to read, write, and count. He also tells them fantastical myths from foreign lands. Few know that Wu Ming was once a person who was completely different than his current self.

His past self's only pursuit in life was to go down in history as the "World's Number One Master." For this purpose, he studied hard, visited many renowned masters, and learned from all schools of thought. He was already gifted in martial arts, and his obsession with it made him a formidable opponent even in his youth, remaining undefeated until he met that older person.

This older person once traveled the world but now lived in an ordinary town. Hearing talk of this person's unparalleled martial art skills, the fighting spirit was rekindled in Wu Ming's empty heart and he stepped forth to challenge this person. His challenge ended not in victory, and he tasted defeat with the sword, spear, and halberd against that person's stick. After his consecutive losses, Wu Ming became obsessed with surpassing this mighty opponent.

For several years after that first challenge, Wu Ming challenged that older person annually, and was defeated every time. He could not figure out how victory still eluded him though he had surpassed his opponent in strength, agility, and skill.

During his last challenge, a group of bandits called Reapers invaded the town where the older person lived. Wu Ming tried to flee-human flesh is no shield against heavy mech after all-but the older person, with his strength, struck the invaders with his stick and subdued three Reapers, ensuring the town's safety. However, he had also exhausted his strength in this last battle and death came swiftly upon him. Wu Ming, witnessing this event, realized the true meaning of being a warrior: True righteous ideals and belief are the key to transcendence. And so, he took on the mantle of his late opponent and embarked on his journey of chivalry under the alias "Wu Ming", or "The Nameless One".
hero.wuming.skill.500191.name: Cyclone Barrier
hero.wuming.skill.500191.desc: Wu Ming twirls his staff at blinding speed and forms an unyielding barrier, dealing Attack 100%/110%/120%/130%/140% Area of Effect damage, gaining invulnerability for 2s.
hero.wuming.skill.500192.name: Inner Clarity
hero.wuming.skill.500192.desc: Wu Ming finds unparalleled clarity by cilencing the chaos within, increasing Attack by 8%/12%/16%/20%/24% and Defense by 16%/24%/32%/40%/48% for 4s.
hero.wuming.skill.500193.name: Remote Impact
hero.wuming.skill.500193.desc: Wu Ming hones his martial arts to perfection, dealing Attack 20%/22%/24%/26%/28% damage to a random ennemy with every normal attack.
hero.wuming.skill.500194.name: Shadow's Evasion
hero.wuming.skill.500194.desc: Wu Ming moves like a shadow, dodging and coutering ennemies, reducing his troops' damage taken from normal attacks by 5%/10%/15%/20%/25% and from skills by 6%/12%/18%/34%/30%.
hero.wuming.skill.500195.name: Crescent Uplift
hero.wuming.skill.500195.desc: Wu Ming spreads his wisdom and techniques, increasing friendly troops' damage dealt by 4%/8%/12%/16%/20%.
hero.wuming.skill.500196.name: Elemental Resonance
hero.wuming.skill.500196.desc: Wu Ming leads everyone to a heightened affinity with their combat techniques, incresaing troops' skill damage dealt by 5%/10%/15%/20%/25%.
hero.wuming.weapon.name: Dragonslayer
hero.wuming.weapon.perk.500197.name: Martial Zenith
hero.wuming.weapon.perk.500197.desc: Wu Ming stands transcendent in the realm of martial arts, increasing damage dealt by 30%.
hero.wuming.weapon.perk.500198.name: Steel Discipline
hero.wuming.weapon.perk.500198.desc: Wu Ming puts defender troops under stern tutelage, increasing Defender Troops' Defense by 15% maximum.
hero.xura.name: Xura
hero.xura.story:
How else should survivors interpret Xura's strange mask, unusual clothing, and odd accent except that he comes from a distant kingdom, far from the present-day Tundra? If only some well-versed explorer could explain which one! Enquiring minds want to know—Xura remains tight-lipped about his origins.

Of course, the short traveler is welcome everywhere anyway. Xura has tried to emulate the language of the Tundra and mount the seemingly insurmountable cultural differences between his own way of thinking and the locals' as best he can. Added to this is Xura's ever-friendly attitude and, most importantly, the extraordinary herbal remedies with which he has cured many survivors to the bafflement of city physicians.

Where did Xura get his herbs? Most of the plants have never been seen on the Tundra, nor can grow there, adding further fuel to the rumors that Xura hails from a place utterly different to the frigid hellscape stretching from horizon to horizon. More curious still is Xura's thirst for knowledge about anything and everything to do with the Tundra, its people, flora, and fauna. His special rapport with local animals has often been remarked upon, as well as a strange willingness to test the medicinal properties of random plants—he often eats them on the spot.

Certain researchers from the Dawn Alliance on a mission to uncover Xura's origins have traced the symbols in his journal to a long-lost tribe known as the "Windbreakers". Xura's mask appears to be shamanistic, indicating a spiritual role around the "Gaia Spirit" in addition to his medical responsibilities.

Surviving records of the Windbreakers are scarce, but paint a picture of a tribe on the verge of extinction even before the Great Chill. Xura's arrival has at least settled the debate on whether the Windbreakers survived. It also points the way to several promising possibilities.

Long before the world experienced a calamitous chill, the Windbreakers under the foresight of their witch-doctors migrated to a vast underground cave system anchored by the "Great Tree".

The Windbreakers found new sources of heat and sustenance even without the warming rays of the sun, especially from the tree's strange roots, and adapted to their new subterranean life. As fate would have it, their odd choice of dwelling sheltered the tribe from the worst of the Great Chill.

Yet Elders say the life force of the Great Tree is fading. And only a legendary Fire Crystal can provide revitalizing nourishment. Xura may only be a recent initiate, but on his shoulders now falls the burden of wandering a strange land to save his people.
hero.xura.skill.500401.name: Life Dance
hero.xura.skill.500401.desc: Xura summons divine aid by dance invocation, healing all friendly heroes’ health equal to Attack*20%/40%/60%/80%/100% per second while reducing their damage taken by 50% for 3 seconds. Xura is immune to control effects throughout.
hero.xura.skill.500402.name: Sporebind
hero.xura.skill.500402.desc: Xura infects the target with a deadly spore, dealing Attack*100%/110%/120%/130%/140% damage each time the target attacks, lasts for 3s.
hero.xura.skill.500403.name: Numbing Dart
hero.xura.skill.500403.desc: A blow dart lotion increases Xura's Attack by 4%/6%/8%/10%/12% with a 20% chance per dart of immobilizing the target for 1 second.
hero.xura.skill.500404.name: Fungal Fog
hero.xura.skill.500404.desc: Xura releases an underground fungi that quickly multiplies to block enemy vision, reducing damage dealt to friendly troops by 4%/8%/12%/16%/20%.
hero.xura.skill.500405.name: Piercing Arrow
hero.xura.skill.500405.desc: Being able to identify the weak spots in the enemy's armor, Xura's Marksmen deal 20%/40%/60%/80%/100% additional damage every 2 strikes and make their target take 5%/10%/15%/20%/25% more damage for 1 turn.
hero.xura.skill.500406.name: Unorthodoxy
hero.xura.skill.500406.desc: Xura's unorthodox tactics are quite disruptive, increasing Marksmen’s damage dealt by 3%/6%/9%/12%/15% while reducing their damage taken by 2%/4%/6%/8%/10%.
hero.xura.weapon.name: Witch Mask
hero.xura.weapon.perk.500407.name: War Cry
hero.xura.weapon.perk.500407.desc: Xura exhorts the highest Attack ally with a tribal war dance, increasing their damage dealt by 60% for 4s.
hero.xura.weapon.perk.500408.name: Gaiac Hymn
hero.xura.weapon.perk.500408.desc: Xura exhorts the City's Defenders with ancient hymns to Gaia, increasing their Attack by 15%.
hero.zinman.name: Zinman
hero.zinman.story:
In the bygone era of the Sunfire Castle, Zinman was renowned as "the Greatest Architect". His understanding of architectural science and art is unparalleled. His designs were brilliant, and his reputation was oustanding. However, his appearance... let’s just say Zinman had no time for such trivial things. If not for the Great Chill, he would no doubt reach ever greater heights in his field of study.

While many of Zinman's former colleagues settled in the nearest Cities, Zinman mysteriously vanished for several years. When he showed himself again, he became a key member of the powerful Dawn Alliance. Under the alliance, Zinman developed new defensive engineering techniques and improvements to the City Furnace. He takes pride in these less artistic but highly practical structures.

Zinman rarely speaks of his family, but people knew of the sudden passing of his daughter. It had always been her dream to see a magnificent greenhouse full of all kinds of flowers. This project was eventually approved by the President of Sunfire Castle after Zinman spent years petitioning for it. Nearly a decade of work on the unfinished greenhouse was destroyed in the chaos following the Great Chill.

Initially, Zinman could not let go of his daughter's dream greenhouse. Then reality beckoned, and he realized survival is everyone’s top priority in the frozen world.

Zinman's post-Chill inventions include shelters with enhanced snow cover and conversion kits to turn nail guns into effective weapons. Although he is helping a lot of survivors with his knowledge, Zinman is painfully aware of his failure to fulfill the promise to his daughter.

After joining Dawn Alliance as the chief architect, Zinman found hope and purpose again. He was glad to use his architectural knowledge to save countless lives, families, and cities. The smile on their faces offered immeasurable comfort to Zinman. He still dreams that one day far in the future, he would build that greenhouse, as an act of remembrance for his family...
hero.zinman.skill.500171.name: Nail Scatter
hero.zinman.skill.500171.desc: Zinman covers the target in a stream of nails, each dealing Attack*55%/60%/65%/70%/75% damage and a 2-second Stun.
hero.zinman.skill.500172.name: Quick Defense
hero.zinman.skill.500172.desc: Zinman works well under pressure, fortifying his position under 50% Health with a +50%/75%/100%/125%/150% boost to his Defense.
hero.zinman.skill.500173.name: Robust
hero.zinman.skill.500173.desc: Zinman's energetic poise provides a +10%/15%/20%/25%/30% Attack Speed boost.
